basics.name: Min Fan
basics.label: Epidemiologist
basics.summary: A fourth-year Ph.D. student in pharmacoepidemiology, with a focus on leveraging real-world evidence to address questions of drug safety and effectiveness.

work.name: University College London
work.summary: Exploring the application of target trial emulation and high dimensional propensity score (HDPS) with datasets in UK or HK
highlights: Exploring optimal antibiotic prescription strategies for patients with urinary tract infections with a target trial emulation framework: application of clone-censor-weight approach with Clinical Practice Research Datalink (CPRD)
Association between antihypertensive drug and dementia development with th HDPS  (R-package development deployed in https://github.com/Cainefm/hdps)

work.name: Department of pharmacology and pharmacy, The University of Hong Kong
work.summary: Pharmacoepidemiology studies which most are using data from the Clinical Data Analysis and Reporting System (CDARS) in Hong Kong (HK)
highlights: The effectiveness of the pneumococcal conjugate vaccine in HK
Epidemiology of antimicrobial resistance: Carbapenemase-producing Enterobacteriaceae and Multi-Drug/Extremely Drug Resistance Pseudomonas aeruginosa in HK
Epidemiology of the Motor Neuron Disease and treatment outcome after Riluzole in HK
Post-market safety events for the orphan drugs from the US FDA database
A summary of the global orphan drug policy

work.name: Faculty of Medicine, The University of Hong Kong
work.summary: Studies and public services related Emergency & Accidence Department in public hospitals settings
highlights: The availability, accessibility, and geographical distribution of Automated External Defibrillators in the urban cities
Residential knowledge attitude and practice about the first-aid
First aid training in the public

work.name: The Jockey Club School of Public Health and Primary Care, The Chinese University of Hong Kong
highlights: The relationship between air pollution and tuberculosis
Data cleaning and analysis for a large prospective cohort about tuberculosis in mainland China

education.institution: The Chinese University of Hong Kong
